message: This is my first offer, it's a fair start, I hope you will accept it. If you want to play more, you have 11 rounds left!

I propose a fair split that slightly favors me as the current proposer. This is much more balanced than your initial offer. Remember, we both lose if we don't agree, and your money will be worth 5% less next round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still believe a more balanced split is possible.  Let's work towards a solution that benefits us both.
